title: Paddington cleans up
brief_description: Adapted from Chapter 2 from the book “Paddington on Top” by Michael Bond. Charming animated tale about neighbourhood free-loader, Mr Curry, plotting to have Paddington clean his house for free. However, his plans come unstuck when Paddington is unable to locate a power point for his vacuum cleaner. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
